skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: animals podcast
des: The Alexa Skills "Animals Podcast" introduces the world of animals. Every week a new episode will be presented with the latest breaking animal news, three mystery animals sounds with reveal and description, a full description for the Animal of the Week, a reading from famous people about the animal world or poem about animals. Author and podcast host Frederick Fichman will also drop in a surprise or two. This Alexa Skills "Animals Podcast" is an addition to the universe of the 12-book 120 animal "Visit the Zoo" series of Kindle books, print books, audio books, and DVD available on Amazon. It is a great introduction to the Animal World.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
